NAME: Guard Captain
TEXT: Captain of the Guard at your service. How can I help you?

NAME: Mysterious Stranger
TEXT: YOU ARE STRONG. FIND US. IN THE BLACK FOREST.

NAME: Carpenter
TEXT: New materials? No? What is it! I'm busy!

NAME: Cartographer
TEXT: Some nights I still dream of finding gold… kekeke.

NAME: Priest
TEXT: Oh great father above protect you.

NAME: Noble Lady
TEXT: Is it that 'Captain' guy again? Urgh! he's so annoying!
